short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instrument, measurement, monitoring, weighting and analytical equipment supplier in China.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doryang is a leading supplier of high-quality instruments, measurement tools, monitoring systems, weighing scales, and analytical equipment based in China. Our innovative solutions are designed to meet the needs of industries ranging from laboratories to manufacturing, healthcare, and beyond. At Doryang, precision and reliability are at the core of everything we do, ensuring our customers can perform their tasks with confidence.  

Discover the Doryang difference: advanced technology, exceptional durability, and unparalleled customer support. Whether you're monitoring processes, conducting research, or managing production, our tools are crafted to deliver accurate results every time.

Doryang Product Categories

1. Measurement Instruments

Digital Calipers
Micrometers
Laser Distance Meters
Infrared Thermometers
Pressure Gauges

2. Monitoring Systems

Temperature and Humidity Data Loggers
Gas Detection Systems
Industrial Cameras
Environmental Monitoring Sensors

3. Weighing Equipment

Digital Weighing Scales
Laboratory Balances

Moisture Analyzers

4. Analytical Equipment

pH Meters
Spectrophotometers
Chromatography Systems
Refractometers
Titrators

5. Laboratory Instruments

Centrifuges
Magnetic Stirrers
Hot Plates
Lab Ovens
Pipettes and Micropipettes

6. Industrial Tools

Torque Wrenches
Ultrasonic Thickness Gauges
Vibration Meters
Surface Roughness Testers
Hardness Testers

7. Customized Solutions

Tailor-made Monitoring Systems
Industry-specific Measurement Tools
Custom Calibration Services
